Package org.catechis.admin

Class Summary
FileUserOptions This class gets a users options as well as adds a new option to every users option file, which is only to retrofit older users after (File)UserUtilities is changed..
FileUserUtilities This class gets a list of users, their folders/categories adds/gets login entries and sets up a list of options in the createUserOptions method to be passed to JDOMFiles which will create a new users option file.
JDOMFiles This class does all the work to add a user, such as creating files and folders as well as confirming if the user already exists, of the invitation code is correct.
JDOMOptions This is a lightweight object to work with user options file.
